## hpr1237 :: Cory Doctorow tribute to Aaron Swartz

 
Today is a special show to commemorate the passing of Aaron Swartz. Thanks to Thomas Gideon for publishing and allowing us to retransmit this audio.

Links

https://thecommandline.net/2013/03/13/doctorow_homeland/
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aaron_Swartz
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cory_Doctorow
https://boingboing.net/2013/01/12/rip-aaron-swartz.html
https://craphound.com/littlebrother/
